name: Rawsec's CyberSecurity Inventory
description: is an inventory and search engine of tools and resources about CyberSecurity that aims to help people to find everything related to CyberSecurity.

name: Rawsec's blog
description: is a blog talking about Linux and security but is also hosting a lot of challenge write-ups (CTF, TryHackMe, HackTheBox, etc.).

name: Ruby Cheatsheet
description: is a lovely Ruby language cheatsheet.

name: The Hacking Tool Trove
description: is a website providing TL;DR manual pages and reviews for hacking tools.

name: RTFM
description: is an association organizing a yearly french event about computer security and monthly meetings.
